headline.main: WAR GOING WELL, CHURCHILL'S VIEW; He Cites Soviet and Libyan Drives, Cut in Sea Losses, Growing Unity of Allies WAR GOING WELL, CHURCHILL'S VIEW

lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, Ont., Dec. 31 -- Answering questions popped at him simultaneously from all sides of the room, Prime Minister Winston Churchill gave in a press interview today some of the reasons for the confident tone of the speeches he made in Washington and Ottawa this week.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
